title: Bulk Calendar Generator
description: Bulk Calendar Generator is a free, privacy-focused tool that converts Excel spreadsheets into calendar files instantly. Perfect for event planners, teachers, and anyone managing multiple events. No more manual data entry - just upload your spreadsheet and get an ICS file ready for any calendar app. With support for multiple formats and unlimited events, you can transform your event scheduling workflow while keeping your data private and secure. No sign-up required, no data stored.
